sentences.en: By judicious management and improvement, it might be made to pay more.
sentences.cn: 只要经营得当,并加以改进, 可能还会多赚一些.

sentences.en: Cropping every year may be possible by judicious pruning and management.
sentences.cn: 用合理的修剪和管理措施可能连年收获.

sentences.en: Especially in dairy production, a judicious use of concentrates will pay dividends.
sentences.cn: 尤其是在牛奶生产中, 审慎使用精饲料将是有利的.

sentences.en: I also learned how to screw our reporters through the judicious use of headlines and subtitles.
sentences.cn: 我又学会如何通过巧妙的大小标题,歪曲记者的意思.

sentences.en: I believe that he can make a judicious choice.
sentences.cn: 我相信他能作出明智的选择.

sentences.en: Instead of expressing everything you feel today, judicious about what you say.
sentences.cn: 今天, 比起你想表达的一切,倒不如更小心你所说的话.

sentences.en: Others manage quite well by making a judicious selection of foods and by taking small helpings.
sentences.cn: 另外一些人,则设法精心选择自己的饮食,限量食用,这个办法就很成功.

sentences.en: Ralph had listened attentively to this judicious report.
sentences.cn: 拉尔夫对这个有见识的报告听得津津有味.

sentences.en: Roosevelt solved the difficulty by judicious mixture of courtesy and sternness.
sentences.cn: 罗斯福明智地混合运用礼貌与严峻来解决这个困难.

sentences.en: She was too sincere, too interested in her judicious companion.
sentences.cn: 她对这位明智的朋友太真诚, 太心悦诚服了.

sentences.en: The first two of these characteristics can be improved by the judicious use of absorbers.
sentences.cn: 适当地利用吸收体,可以使前两种相应特性得到改善.

sentences.en: The President authorizes the judicious use of military force to protect our citizens.
sentences.cn: 总统授权可以明智而审慎地动用军队保护我们的公民。

sentences.en: To my joy, he left us, after giving this judicious counsel.
sentences.cn: 他给了这个得体的劝告之后,就离开我们, 这使我很开心.

sentences.en: TYPICAL USE A judicious historian selects and weighs facts carefully and critically.
sentences.cn: 明智的历史学家以小心翼翼、批判性的态度权衡事实.

sentences.en: We should listen to the judicious opinion of that old man.
sentences.cn: 我们应该听取那位老人明智的意见.

words.tran_cn: 判断；裁判；判决书；辨别力
有见识的,机灵的,敏锐的
精明的,明断的,慎重的,明智的,合理的

trans.tran_cn: 明智的，有见识的，判断正确的，审慎的
trans.tran_en: done in a sensible and careful way
